# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(word) + sum(length(line) for line in lines) <= text_width
            # Add the word to the last line
            lines[end] *= " $word"
        else
            # Start a new line with the word
            push!(lines, " $word")
        end
    end

    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example = wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
println(example)
```

will wrap words
into lines
